mapper.insert: INSERT INTO obreserve ( branch, pet_name, pet_weight, applicant_name, applicant_phone, ob_date, ob_time, notes, user_id, created_at, status ) VALUES ( #{branch}, #{petName}, #{petWeight}, #{applicantName}, #{applicantPhone}, #{obDate}, #{obTime}, #{notes}, #{userId}, NOW(), #{status} )
mapper.select: SELECT ob_time FROM obreserve WHERE ob_date = #{obDate} AND branch = #{branch} AND status = '수락'
